name: Proper guiding
description: We always guide our students in proper manner. It doesn't matter which situation you are in but we care.

name: Better evaluation
description: We will evaluate our student's ability to grow in particular subject accordingly.

name: Helping hands to struggling students
description: We help students who struggle a little bit. We will take special care of.

name: Comprehensive expertise
description: Expert on particular subject is very important. Will try my best to provide great learning experience

name: Media toolkit
description: We are flexible in teaching. We can do it online if the student don't be able to be present physically

name: New concepts
description: We give students concepts of today's world in efficient way. It's not like the textbook way.
